bug.author: lufengguang
bug.summary: errors meet after django call several times saver.restore

comments.comment: I am not sure it's a bug in TensorFlow. I think you're trying to restore from a checkpoing from different models. Do you have a simpler repro? Without django? (It could be concurrent access to the web server?)
I'm sure the models are the same .Otherwise the front several times would not work . I send the repro to your email. Thanks~
Not sure if you have my email, but you can just use pastebin if it's public.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lufengguang>@lufengguang</denchmark-link> , we cannot generally give help over private channels. You should make a reproducible example that can be posted publicly, please. That way other people than <denchmark-link:https://github.com/drpngx>@drpngx</denchmark-link> , can help.
Automatically closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!
